inclusion.criterion: Ambulant patients with BMD diagnosis confirmed by genetic testing.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to give informed consent in writing.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to perform 6MWT at screening with a minimum distance of 200 m and maximum distance of 450 m.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Exposure to another investigational drug within 3 months prior to the start of study treatment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of any pharmacologic treatment, other than corticosteroids, that might have an effect on muscle strength or function within 3 months prior to the start of study treatment (e.g., growth hormone).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has lower urinary tract symptoms including frequency, urgency, weak stream, incomplete emptying and intermittent flow for the past 9 months. He is otherwise healthy.
